duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide general practice and soft tissue surgery services for dogs and cats in a fear-free, AAHA accredited, and gold-level certified facility.
Collaborate with a 5 DVM team and provide mentorship to support staff.
Work a 4-day week (8-5) with one short shift on Saturdays each month.
Make a real difference in the lives of pets and their caretakers by being an awesome animal advocate.
